1.17.1.1.4.3:
* Fixed market toast to display at the new time
* Fixed cosmetic slot locking not being it's own config
* Removed cosmetic prop locking in favor of server side off-hand swap
1.17.1.1.4.2: * Fixed players not displaying when using Essential
1.17.1.1.4.0:
* (Fabric) Fabric API no longer needs to be downloaded separately as the necessary modules are packaged with the mod.
* Updated to 1.17
* Integrated mod into the server
    - Custom entities now take advantage of this new integration, meaning better latency and no longer desync (parts snapping away from each other)
    - Name tags are now rendered natively, meaning they will no longer move away from the player
    - Clients are no longer sent un-necessary entities, such as the entities for back swags and name tags
    - Packet traffic has been massively decreased
* Cosmetic enhancements have been split into Back Swag Slot and Unobtrusive Props
* Fixed rich presence not working on macs with ARM processors
* Removed inventory full alert feature
* Removed sodium patches

1.16.5.1.3.1:
+ Added better back swags!
Better back swags improves the rendering of back swags by rendering them natively onto the player instead of through an armor stand. This also adds a new slot to show off your back swag in your inventory!

+ Added location tracking option
Disabling this will set your location to 'unknown' meaning things such as rich presence will just show you in game, not your location.

+ When cosmetics are in your inventory, their slots are locked
* Fixed inventory alert translation key
1.16.5.1.3.0:
* (Forge) Added config menu
* (Fabric) Replace config menu with a new universal one which is used on Forge
* New look! Since we've gone official, the mod has been given a new look with a fresh new logo and icon!
* Refactored many mod internals, mainly how configuration and features work.
* Rich presence now runs asynchronously and uses a new library
1.16.5.1.2.1:
* Prevented new item predicate optimization from loading when OptiFine is present
* Moved some config entries
1.16.5.1.2.0:
+ (Forge) Added mod logo
+ Backported 1.17 item predicate optimizations, this should show a 2-3x performance increase at spawn
+ Added block sound system (actual sounds are not yet implemented, they'll show up soon)
* Fixed edge-case crash where Minecraft can be null when getting the server info
* Changed cosmetics to show a unique id instead of 'originrealms:cosmetic'
* Replaced config button with a new texture
* Reworked mod internals to be more efficient
- Removed planter boxes breaking when sneaking feature.
1.16.5.1.1.2:
* (Fabric) Now possible to load on 1.16.5
* Advanced tooltips now show the origin realms registry key instead of the minecraft one
* Improved right clicking on custom blocks
* Improved planter right clicking, your arm now swings when right clicking the top of the planter when it has no plant and you are holding nothing
* Renamed some config entries
* Fixed some error messages being spammed
* Fixed normal armor stands not rendering outside of OR

+ Added better back swags!
Better back swags improves the rendering of back swags by rendering them natively onto the player instead of through an armor stand. This also adds a new slot to show off your back swag in your inventory!

+ Added location tracking option
Disabling this will set your location to 'unknown' meaning things such as rich presence will just show you in game, not your location.

+ When cosmetics are in your inventory, their slots are locked

1.16.4.1.1.1: * Fixed edge-case crash when pressing space after tab completion.
1.16.4.1.1.0:
* Added prop hiding in first person.
* Added ping sound for auction purchases.
* Added keybinds for spawn and realm. (Unbound by default)
* Added proper autocompletion for mentions and emoji.
* Emojis & NPCs are filtered out of the social menu.
* Fixed location tracking for chatrooms.
* Planters can now be broken by shift clicking with an empty hand. (Off by default)
* Rearranged config.
* Updated registry to be remote.
1.16.4.1.0.7:
* (Forge) Added config button. Currently just opens the config file.
* Added anti-advertise chat filter feature. (Off by default)
* Fixed IP matcher only checking for lowercase IPs.
1.16.4.1.0.6:
* (Forge) Fixed build issues causing startup crashes.
* (Forge) Categorized config.
* (Forge) Fixed Jacko restock notifications being off by default.
* (Fabric) Added contact links (website and issues) to the mod menu entry.
* Moved armor stand interpolation into enhancements.
1.16.4.1.0.5:
* (Forge) Fixed startup crash.
* Removed auto connect.
* Added back swag cosmetic snapping.
* Made cutscene enhancements configurable.
1.16.4.1.0.4:
* (Fabric) Updated the config button.
* Added toast disable feature (Advancements, tutorial & recipes).
* Reorganized config and added tooltips.
1.16.4.1.0.3:
* (Forge) Fixed crash when right clicking planter boxes.
* Fixed rich presence not initializing on macOS and OSX.
1.16.4.1.0.2: * Fixed startup crash caused by invalid mixins.
1.16.4.1.0.1: * Planters now have a setting to prevent breaking.
